Name: Drummer Solvent
AttributesDescription: Boosts Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one table can make the entire squad's ears ring with a thrilling rhythm, as if they were holding drumsticks instead of weapons.
ObtainedShowDescription: Boosts Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
